title: SOTRU - State of the Re:Union Spring 2011 Promo 1
description: I'm Al Letson, host of State of the Re:Union, and every episode we travel the country and tell stories about the American people and their connection to the place they call home. Miami, Utica, New York, Oakland, Las Vegas, Birmingham, Alabama. This season we meet unlikely people making inspiring changes in places you'd never expect, on State of the Re:Union.
contentencoded: I'm Al Letson, host of State of the Re:Union, and every episode we travel the country and tell stories about the American people and their connection to the place they call home. Miami, Utica, New York, Oakland, Las Vegas, Birmingham, Alabama. This season we meet unlikely people making inspiring changes in places you'd never expect, on State of the Re:Union.
